mainText:
There are very few people in the world that nearly all of us would agree
that our lives are better because that person lived at the same time as we
have.

Steve Jobs is in fact the only one I can think of.

I am very thankful to have been able to be along for the ride.

Rest well, Steve.

My condolences to his family, and to all of those affiliated with Apple
who are feeling this loss.
header: We are fortunate to have lived when Steve Jobs did
author: Rob
